item.title: Leica M9 - Field Test and Hands-on Review - DigitalRev.com
item.description:
Leica M9 - Field Test and Hands-on Review - DigitalRev.com

Perhaps the video that inspired my love for Leica. The M9 was a fascinating camera at the time. Even today it can take wonderful photos. Thank you Kai.

item.title: Fantastic Leica M262 Review (Leica M Typ 262) with sample images
item.description:
Fantastic Leica M262 Review (Leica M Typ 262) with sample images

On November 19 Leica introduced the M Typ 262, the successor to the Leica M-E, which was really an M9 minus the frame line preview lever and USB port. The M262, however, is based on the M240 but shares the body shape and weight of the M9 series.

item.title: La Vida Leica!
item.description:
La Vida Leica!

Best news and rumor site, for staying up to date with Leica I go to La Vida Leica.

item.title: Leica Forum
item.description:
Leica Forum

The best Leica forum, for anyone that wants to do research or just have friendly banter this is the forum for you

item.title: Ragnar Axelsson - Around Iceland in 80 hours. A Leica portrait
item.description:
Ragnar Axelsson - Around Iceland in 80 hours. A Leica portrait

Very cool video, I hope one day to be able to travel to such places.

item.title: Craig Semetko: How to use a Leica M Camera
item.description:
Craig Semetko: How to use a Leica M Camera

What makes the Leica M different from SLRs? Follow along with photographer Craig Semetko as he answers this question and explains how to use the Leica M, including techniques on focusing. For Craig, the benefits of the Leica M include its small, discreet nature and big, bright viewfinder that allows you to see more.

item.title: The Future of Leica?
item.description:
The Future of Leica?

With Leica introducing several new cameras including the M240, M260, M262, Q and SL the direction Leica is heading. Introducing live view has left many wondering if the are moving away from the rangefinder system and traditionalists would argue that Leica is venturing away from what has made them great.

item.title: What Makes the Leica M Special?
item.description:
What Makes the Leica M Special?

My introduction to Leica was through internet reviews around the release of the M9. After reading people wax poetically about the quality and shooting experience I knew a Leica was in my future. Being able to shoot an M6 since 2012 I feel more equipped to state why Leica make special cameras.
